NATIONAL ASSOCIATION OF EDUCATIONAL BROADCASTERS
OFFICE OF THE PRESIDENT
Station KUOM
University of Minnesota
Minneapolis 14, Minnesota
February 27, 1958
Mr, Sam L, Becker
Director
Division of Television-Radio-Film
State University of Iowa
Iowa City, Iowa
Dear Sam:
I am in the strange position of spending so much time
on the affairs of NAEB that I am neglecting some of the
affairs of NAEB! I refer specifically to this very delayed
answer to your letter of January 20,
I note that you thoughtfully sent a carbon of it to
Harry Skornia. Most of the questions raised are, I think,
more in his province than mine, since I leave details of
budget planning to him and to his staff. I think he has
already answered some of your questions, but I am sending
him a copy of this letter to remind him to cover any items
he may have skipped.
This, of course, is not to say that I am not willing
or ready to help anytime I can be of assistance.
With best personal regards,
Yours sincerely
Burton Paulu
President
BP:ds
cc: Harry J. Skornia
